meanings.sent1: The antieducational book discouraged students from learning.
meanings.sent2: The school board rejected the antieducational curriculum proposal.
meanings.sent3: The antieducational poster had a cartoon character refusing to study.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a fortress of antieducational beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds of antieducational ideas loomed over the classroom.

meanings.definition: Preventing or hindering the process of education.
meanings.sent1: The antieducational policies limited access to educational resources.
meanings.sent2: The faulty projector was causing an antieducational environment.
meanings.sent3: The antieducational computer virus kept crashing the online lectures.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness acted as an antieducational barrier to progress.
meanings.sent5: The weeds of antieducational distractions grew in the students' minds.
